name: gatsby-stripe-clientside-checkout
description: creates stripe starter with just the api keys and enabling 'clientside-checkout' on stripe dashboard. $5 unlimited stock item, $5 monthly subscription, and $5 sku'd item for inventory(inventory managed items not yet supported on clientside-checkout, no eta 'Sku's with finite inventory are not supported today' Stripes words. For now it functions like $5 unlimited items).
